w1.name: Twisted Advance
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy while being {{tip|untargetable}}, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|root|rooting}} them for a duration upon arrival.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Maokai dashes to the target enemy while being untargetable, dealing them magic damage and rooting them for a duration upon arrival.
w1.notes:
* '''Maokai''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash to the target's previous location without applying ''Twisted Advance's'' effects if the target is too far away or moves beyond the maximum tracking distance.
** He will stop dashing if the target is too far away the moment the dash begins.
* ''Twisted Advance'' will fail to deal damage and apply the {{tip|root}} if the target is {{tip|untargetable}} upon arrival.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

  • Root Duration:

i1.name: Sap Magic
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Periodically, '''Maokai's''' next [[basic attack]] has an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} and {{tip|heal|heals}} him for {{pp|5;15 to 65 for 6|1;6;9 to 17}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|6;7.5;9 to 13 for 5|1;6;9 to 17}} '''maximum''' health)}} after a {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Reduced by attack speed.}}-second delay.
Each time '''Maokai''' casts an [[Champion ability|ability]] or is struck by an enemy's ability, ''Sap Magic's'' {{sti|cooldown|link=true}} is reduced by 4 seconds.
''Sap Magic'' will not activate if '''Maokai''' is {{as|above 95% '''maximum''' {{sti|health}}}}.
''Sap Magic'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Maokai's''' basic attack timer.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Periodically, Maokai's next basic attack has an uncancelable windup and heals him for 1;6;9 to 17 ‒ undefined (+ 1;6;9 to 17 ‒ undefined maximum health) after a 0.25-second delay.
Each time Maokai casts an Champion ability or is struck by an enemy's ability, Sap Magic's cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.
Sap Magic will not activate if Maokai is above 95% maximum health.
Sap Magic resets Maokai's basic attack timer.
i1.notes:
* ''Sap Magic'' does not occur if the attack is {{tip|dodge|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Maokai''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}. It will occur if it is {{tip|block|blocked}}.
* ''Sap Magic'' does not trigger versus [[structures]] or [[ward]]s.
* The striking ability has to trigger [[ability effects|spell effects]] such as {{tip|spell damage}} or {{tip|area damage}} for the cooldown to be reduced.
* If '''Maokai''' possesses a {{tip|spell shield}} and it consumes an enemy ability, he will still receive the cooldown reduction.

e1.name: Sapling Toss
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' {{tip|projectile|flings}} a ''Sapling'' to the target location, granting {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|can see across terrain from the center, but not into bush}}.

Once landed, ''Saplings'' remain stationary for 30 seconds or until they react to the first nearby visible enemy, chasing them for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds. ''Saplings'' explode upon colliding with an enemy or when they expire, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies upon detonation, capped at 300 against non-champions, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 35% for 2 seconds.

''Saplings'' placed in a {{tip|brush}} instead last 30 {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% '''bonus''' health)}} seconds and deal double damage to struck targets over 3 instances as well as {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 3 seconds. The first instance of damage is dealt instantly and the second and third instances occur each {{fd|0.75}} seconds thereafter. The '''total''' damage is capped at 600 against non-champions.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Maokai flings a Sapling to the target location, granting sight of the area.
Once landed, Saplings remain stationary for 30 seconds or until they react to the first nearby visible enemy, chasing them for up to 2.5 seconds. Saplings explode upon colliding with an enemy or when they expire, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies upon detonation, capped at 300 against non-champions, and slowing them by 35% for 2 seconds.
Saplings placed in a brush instead last 30 (+ 2.5% bonus health) seconds and deal double damage to struck targets over 3 instances as well as revealing them for 3 seconds. The first instance of damage is dealt instantly and the second and third instances occur each 0.75 seconds thereafter. The total damage is capped at 600 against non-champions.
leveling: {{st|Total Increased Damage|{{ap|50|100|150|200|250}} {{as|(+ {{ap|14|14.5|15|15.5|16}}% {{as|(+ 1.6% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Increased Damage Per Tick|{{ap|50/3|100/3|150/3|200/3|250/3|round=2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|14/3|14.5/3|15/3|15.5/3|16/3|round=2}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5{{recurring|3}}}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|area damage}} from a normal ''Sapling'' and deals {{tip|persistent damage}} to enemies hit by an empowered ''Sapling''.
* ''Saplings'' have a base [[movement speed]] of 400, increased based on '''Maokai's''' [[boots]]:
** {{ii|Boots}}: 425
** {{ii|Berserker's Greaves}}, {{ii|Ionian Boots of Lucidity}}, {{ii|Mercury's Treads}}, {{ii|Plated Steelcaps}} and {{ii|Sorcerer's Shoes}}: 445
** {{ii|Boots of Swiftness}} and {{ii|Mobility Boots}}: 460
* ''Sapling Toss'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target location even while the ''Sapling'' is in flight.
* The ''Saplings'' will continue to chase their target even if they lose {{tip|sight}} of them (but they do not prioritize champions so they will chase the first target they encounter).
* ''Saplings'' will appear on the map as minions despite being untargetable and invulnerable.
* ''Saplings'' cannot stack on top of each other (they will move a short distance away from one another if they are aimed at the same location).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not negate the damage from an empowered ''Sapling''.
* The damage of empowered ''Saplings'' is equally split into chunks of {{fd|66.7}}% of the normal ''Sapling'' damage every second, once immediately, and then at the 1 and 2 second mark.
* The ''Sapling'' will stop its movement upon colliding with {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
* ''Saplings'' attack {{ui|Baron Nashor}} always at the same two points, no matter where they were placed.[[File:Sapling Toss Baron_Nashor.png|center|200px]]

r1.name: Nature's Grasp
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' summons a colossal wall of 5 thorny brambles that slowly advances in the target direction, accelerating over time, each stopping when they collide with an enemy {{tip|champion}}.

Each bramble deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies caught within and {{tip|root|roots}} them for {{pp|type=distance traveled|0.8 to 2.6|0 to 1000 by 100|formula=Starts at 0.8 seconds and increases up to 2.6 seconds over 1000 units traveled}} seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Maokai summons a colossal wall of 5 thorny brambles that slowly advances in the target direction, accelerating over time, each stopping when they collide with an enemy champion.
Each bramble deals magic damage to enemies caught within and roots them for 0 to 1000 by 100 ‒ undefined seconds.
r1.notes:
* Any one enemy champion can be affected by ''Nature's Grasp'' more than once; they can be damaged and rooted by other brambles even after already colliding with one.
* The brambles are made up of 4 {{tip|projectile|missiles}} each which trail 100 units behind one another. The front missile carries the visual effect. When colliding with a champion, all missiles of one bramble are destroyed simultaneously.
** Missiles destroyed by other means such as {{cai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} may not destroy their fellows from the same branch, resulting in one or more invisible missiles that may still collide.{{bug}}
* ''Nature's Grasp'' will fire based on '''Maokai's''' location at the start of the cast time.

q1.name: Bramble Smash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Maokai''' releases an arcane shockwave that travels forth in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies it passes through and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 99% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
Enemies near '''Maokai''' are also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and {{tip|airborne|knocked back}} up to 300 units based on their proximity to him.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Maokai releases an arcane shockwave that travels forth in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and slowing them by 99% for 0.25 seconds.
Enemies near Maokai are also stunned for 0.5 seconds and knocked back up to 300 units based on their proximity to him.
q1.notes: * ''Bramble Smash'' will cast from wherever '''Maokai''' is at the end of the cast time.
